item.title: Frontier makes new offer to combine with bankrupt Spirit Airlines — and is rebuffed
item.description: After walking away from a deal twice last year, Frontier is now making an offer involving fresh debt and stock.

item.title: Analysts lift Starbucks’ stock price targets as Wall Street buys into turnaround
item.description: A Stifel analyst praises effort to reintroduce Starbucks brand to a wider audience.

item.title: Oil prices decline after industry data shows rise in crude inventories
item.description: Oil futures fell Wednesday morning, feeling pressure after industry data showed a large rise in crude inventories.

item.title: Diners are flocking to Chili’s again, says parent company Brinker
item.description: Brinker, the parent company of Maggiano’s and Chili’s, saw its stock rising premarket after earnings crushed estimates for its fiscal second quarter.

item.title: Here’s how much gas could cost you if Trump’s threatened tariffs go through
item.description: President Donald Trump has threatened to place 25% tariffs on Canada and Mexico as soon as this Saturday, potentially disrupting the relatively stable...
